result.reason: Current layout serialization only handles tool windows (Config, Tree, Errors) and ignores connection windows, causing users to lose their split-view arrangements on restart. Implementing this requires extending the layout loader to handle dynamic connection window persistence.
result.approach: Override `GetPersistString` in `ConnectionWindow` to return a string containing the window type and a list of hosted connection IDs. Modify `DockPanelLayoutLoader.GetContentFromPersistString` to detect this pattern, instantiate a new `ConnectionWindow`, and trigger the opening/restoration of the specified connections within that window.
